Text:
Narrates the life story of a violinist, Jeno Varga, who falls in love with a young pianist, and does everything to be able to play a concert (written for the film by Ennio Morricone) together with her.

The title is given by the piece for two violins (again written by Morricone) based on a melody played by the first violin in the classical way, while the second plays it from the end to the beginning, and then followed by a coda.
